Row.Text: Energy won't be considered as a kind of limited resources any more.[NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_Production] production to the Mine improvement.+20% [ICON_Science] science in all cities.+20% [ICON_Production] production in all cities.
We want to figure out the behaviour of those things in which is highly near the light speed.[NEWLINE] +20% [ICON_Science] science in all cities.+20% [ICON_Production] production in all cities.

Matters with negative mass or infinity denisty seems not only exist in our imagination. We required new math to handle them[NEWLINE]+20% [ICON_Science] science in all cities.+20% [ICON_Production] production in all cities.
Human beings are learning to control the space around them now.[NEWLINE]+20% [ICON_Science] science in all cities.+20% [ICON_Production] production in all cities.
Nothing is impossible, even this powerful enginee driven faster than light.[NEWLINE]+20% [ICON_Science] science in all cities.+20% [ICON_Production] production in all cities.
